<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bastion of the Inheritor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1841)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 5
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Bastion Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=17)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Worn by [Iomedae's](/Deities.aspx?ID=9) prestigious knights, this _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [bastion plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=17)_ is emblazoned with the Inheritor's [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) and sports a white cloak. While the cloak is white, this armor grants you a +2 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), provided your target has no enmity toward Iomedae.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))    **Effect** The armor's cloak becomes red for 1 minute. As long as the cloak is red, you gain the benefits of the armor's deflect melee trait without needing to spend an additional action to activate it during each turn.

**Craft Requirements** You worship Iomedae.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bastion of the Inheritor
